abstract: A British soccer official stirred up a hornet's nest by charging that some of the foreign owners who have bought into the Premier League have been meeting behind the scenes to discuss a plan to end the idea of relegation and promotion.
snippet: A British soccer official stirred up a hornet's nest by charging that some of the foreign owners who have bought into the Premier League have been meeting behind the scenes to discuss a plan to end the idea of relegation and promotion.
lead_paragraph: A British soccer official stirred up a hornet's nest Monday by charging that some of the foreign owners who have bought into England's Premier League have been meeting behind the scenes to discuss a plan to end the practice of relegation and promotion.

headline.main: A Relegation Fight No One Wants
